titleStmt.title: Remarks upon Remarques, or, A vindication of the conversations of the town in another letter directed to the same Sir T.L.
titleStmt.author: T. L., Sir.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.C. for William Hensman ...,

notesStmt.note: An answer to "Remarques on the humours and conversations of the town, written in a letter to Sir T.L." 1673.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
